title: Collaboration-Based Multimedia Design and Development Process

context.prior_knowledge: Expert-level knowledge and experience in solving complex problems
context.additional_context: Project implementing delivery of mathematics multimedia educational content to actual clients (other educational institutions/departments)

learning_goals: Learners will form 4–5-member collaborative teams, apply the three-stage multimedia design process (requirements analysis, storyboard creation, prototype development), establish two mathematics education project plans within six months, and achieve 4/5 or higher in four of five team evaluation rubric items (clarity, feasibility, creativity) on a 5-point scale.
Acquisition of technical skills to develop interactive media for visualizing mathematical concepts
Cultivating the ability to execute a prototype improvement process incorporating real user feedback
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
